title: Roger Waters - 2015-10-30 Bay Street Theater, Sag Harbor, NY
description:
A new addition to my bootleg archive. A true gem, a recent Roger Waters performance.

Please enjoy, share and seed :)

===============================

Shared with permission from the original uploader on another tracker:


Roger Waters and G.E. Smith
Bay Street Theater
Sag Harbor, NY
October 30, 2015

The Ken G. Collection Vol 255
Source: Zoom H4n w/Internal mics (16/44)
Editing: Soundforge 9.0 (editing and tracking) > TLH (SB's Aligned) > Flac Level 8
Traders Den 11/1/15
kingrue upload 636
================================================== ====
What a surprise I have here today!
I had recently read in the newspaper that Roger had just played in a small church in Old Lyme, CT.
Which was just in the next town over from where I live. I had no idea Roger was going to be so close by.
I thought what is he doing and why would such a huge rock star be playing for such a small crowd in a tiny town
that never has musicians playing? Well except that time back in 1991 when I saw Foghat on the beach.
Otherwise having Roger Waters in Old Lyme was strange and exciting.
Then out of the blue, late last night I get a file transfer from my taping friend Ken G. (who is now retired) and
if I thought he went to a lot of concerts before, seems to now be attending concerts at a fevered pitch.
Which is a bonus for any music fan/collector.
Ken says security was breathing down his neck and a strict no recording of any kind policy.
The recording came out as good as you might expect with a somewhat quiet stage volume and louder crowd response.
It's cool that GE Smith is involved, delivery some great electric guitar.
Ken did all the tracking, I did some additional editing by lowering the crowd cheer and boosting the music.
Big thanks goes out to Ken for his recording and efforts.
01 Introduction
02 When The Tigers Broke Free
03 Mother
04 Poem
05 Crystal Clear Brooks
06 Hello in There
07 Blowin' In The Wind
08 Safe and Sound
09 We Shall Overcome
10 Roger Talking
11 Poem
12 Wish You Were Here
13 Comfortably Numb
14 Lay Down Jerusalem
15 Forever Young

Total Time = 101:32 min
Enjoy
George
